action.name: Multiattack
entries: Torgud makes two melee attacks with his longsword.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +4} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.
{@bold {@italic Purpose.}} Give the players orders and quests.
{@bold {@italic Trait.}} I assume everyone will betray me eventually. (Flaw)

reaction.name: Bodyguard
entries: If a creature within 5 feet of Torgud is hit by an attack roll, he may use his reaction to force the attacking creature to reroll their attack, potentially causing it to miss. To use this ability, Torgud must be able to see both the creature and its attacker.

trait.name: Shield Wall
entries: Torgud adds 2 to his AC if at least one of his allies is within 5 feet and the ally is wielding a shield and isnâ€™t {@condition incapacitated}.
